svg.text: McCzarny recently made significant progress on
issues and refining the system to deter a stray
cat. He introduced a time-based trigger for the
cat deterrent. He actively developed his
ghsummary tool, adding a "strict" mode for
detailed analysis powered by an LLM. This
involved updating the API, CLI, and GitHub
Action workflow. He also enhanced the
upload-image GitHub Action. He added support
for Cloudinary and created a separate action
for deleting images from IMGBB. He performed
test fixes and prepared for a new release of
the upload action. He updated his personal
profile README to link to the ghsummary tool.
